attributes.action: Petition to award Coleraine a silver postbox in honour of our Olympic heroes, Richard and Peter Chambers and Alan Campbell
attributes.additional_details: Coleraine in Northern Ireland has contributed 3 Olympic medals at London 2012. These are likely to be the only medals from Northern Ireland. This unique occasion should be commemorated by a silver postbox in Coleraine that honours the achievements of our three Olympic heroes. Furthermore, the new postbox should be placed as close to Bann Rowing Club as possible as it is responsible for the early training of these heroes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Royal Mail.
